price: 82. Kasi te, bakopengwaka na mabondeli ma bango, mpe bakozalaka banguna na bango.
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَيَكۡفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ضِدًّا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: kallā sayakfurūna biʿibādatihim wayakūnūna ʿalayhim ḍiddan
